attributes.action: Make free vehicle history checks to prevent unsafe cars being sold.
attributes.additional_details: Companies charge for this information but to prevent unlawful sales of potentially unsafe cars the government should make milage history, mot history and if the car has been scrapped or in an accident free.
attributes.background: With the government having access to all vehicle details the freedom of information act should cover the information on a cars history.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We’re not sure what you’d like Government or Parliament to do.

You can check the MOT history of a vehicle for free here: 

www.check-mot.service.gov.uk

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for a new law to make it a criminal offence to give misleading information when selling a car.
